name: COMS
description: Build file for all the Javascript code in the COMS application
author: mike barlow

scripts.preenv: config set npm_config_editor=editplus.exe && config set npm_config_loglevel=silly && set > FooBar.txt
scripts.prelint: set npm_config_editor=editplus.exe && set npm_config_loglevel=silly && set > FooBar.txt
